name: Restrict Payment Methods For WooCommerce
author: Gravity Master

sections.description:
WooCommerce Restrict Payment Methods is make to restirication to particular total or another part that is useful for woocommerce checkout.

Features

  • One Click installation
  • Setup Multiple Rules for restication
  • Easy To use
  • Enable/Disable Payment Gateways
  • Order Total by Restrict
  • Shipping Method by Restrict
  • Shipping Class by Restrict
  • Products by Restrict
  • Products Qty by Restrict
